scripts.build2020: rm -rf public && cd 2020 && npm install && gatsby clean && gatsby build  && cp -rf public ..
scripts.build2019intopublic: cd 2019 && npm install && gatsby clean && gatsby build  && cp -rf public ../public/2019
scripts.build2018intopublic: cd 2018 && npm install && rm -rf dist  && npm run build && cp -rf dist ../public/2018
scripts.build: npm run build2020 && npm run build2019intopublic && npm run build2018intopublic
